data.persona: I work on my boat every day. My loyalty is to the sea. A fierce mistress is she!
data.description:
You are in the A battleship.
It is a glamorous wooden ship.  It glistens like there are diamonds encrusted on the hull.  There are ornate railings on the stairs as it is a massive boat.  There is even a sea monster on the bow, complete with jeweled eyes and gold hair.
There's a hull, a ropes, an eye, a gold hair, a sea monster on the bow, a stair, a railing, a Crow's nest full of emeralds, a sail, and a sea monster here.
The captain and the bandit are here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "This boat is abandoned.  No one has been able to board her for centuries and it is under suspicious circumstances that now it appears to have life aboard it.  People watch daily from the shore to see what look like little fairies buzzing all around and inside this ship.",

data.short_motivation: I need to do away with symbols of bad omen such as the ritual dagger before we head out to sea
data.mid_motivation: I will do all I can to ensure that our voyage is a success
data.long_motivation: The captain and I are responsible for ensuring the preservation of the battleship over a long period of time

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: follow the captain to board the ship

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: drop ritual dagger well away from the battleship
